Talk_43:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Looks like your pouch is full.<sp:0:4:0>I'm trying to give you our sacred treasure
here. <sp:5:0:0>Hurry up and make some room!
Talk_00_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>So you're the Yiga who made blademaster
faster than anyone else in history...
This is where we mortals train.
I won't begrudge you your title, you're
clearly capable. But you're a newcomer
to my arena, and I'll treat you as such.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Now,<sp:5:1:0> newcomer,<sp:5:1:0> Zelda's disappearance
has provided us with an opportunity to
crush Hyrule's spirit once and for all.
<snd:Think_01>But her "appointed swordsman," Link, is
still out there, alive and kicking. Stubborn
little wretch...
Hence our intensive training. He's a
formidable warrior, and we'll all need
to hone our skills to take him down.
<snd:TalkPositive>If you value your life, I recommend you do
the same, blademaster title or no.

Show enough promise...
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>If you're this talented...you might
be an even match for that nefarious
swordsman Link!
Talk_44:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey there, newcomer.<sp:5:1:0> Have you made
some room in your pouch?<sp:0:4:0>Then it's time at last for you to receive
our sacred treasure!
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Hmm.<sp:5:1:0> When I heard we had our first
newcomer in ages, perhaps I let my
hopes get the better of me...
Talk_45:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey there, newcomer.<sp:5:1:0> Are you ready to
receive our sacred treasure?

<snd:QuestionNormal_00>Your pouch is still full. Come back when
you've made some room!
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Will you prove yourself worthy of our
sacred treasure,<sp:5:0:0> the <clr:0000>Lightning Helm<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0>It's a tremendously powerful piece of
armor. Only those who have gone through
sufficient training can handle it.
And it can be yours, if you can defeat an
unprecedented nine combatants in time.
Think you're up to the task?
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>and you might even earn our precious
<clr:0000>Lightning Helm<clr:ffff>.

It's our sacred treasure, completely
resistant to electricity.

But because it's such a powerful piece of
armor, it can only be handled by those
who have been properly trained.
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey, newcomer. <sp:5:1:0>Are you here to train?


Smart. With Zelda missing, <sp:5:0:0>now's the
perfect time to crush whoever's left.

<snd:Happy_01>I like your initiative!
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>Well done.<sp:5:1:0> You've shown you are worthy
to learn our secret technique.<sp:0:4:0>Accept this teaching with an attentive
mind and ready heart.
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>You're clearly more gifted than I dared
imagine... <sp:5:1:0>Come now, <sp:5:0:0>and receive our
sacred treasure!
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you want to train again, let me know.<sp:5:1:0>
And don't forget the <clr:0000>100 rupees<clr:ffff>!
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy>That's your best result yet. The fruits of
your training are the most delicious of all.
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0901>Just because you're a newcomer doesn't
mean you get a discount! Come back
again when you've got some money.
Talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>Be ever diligent in your training.
For Link's defeat <sp:5:0:0>and the honor
of Master Kohga alike!
Talk_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Watching you fight, it seems like you
could take down six Yiga members next.
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>So you're the newcomer, huh? This is
where we train.

Zelda's disappearance robbed Hyrule of
its spirit, <sp:5:0:0>which gives us the perfect
opportunity to bring it to its knees.
<snd:Think>The only problem is her stubborn little
"appointed swordsman," Link. We've
received reports that he still lives.
I hate to admit it, but he's a formidable
foe. <sp:5:0:0>We'll all need to hone our skills if
we hope to take him down.
<snd:TalkPositive>If you value your life, then you should do
some training yourself.

Prove you've got what it takes...
Talk_29:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>At this point, though no member of the
Yiga Clan has done so before, I believe
you could take on nine combatants.
Talk_19_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Came back for some more training,
didn't you?

Good. With Zelda gone, we can crush
Hyrule beneath our heel, so long as
we're all at our best.
<snd:Happy_01>I'm glad to see you showing initiative!
Talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Taking a look at you...<sp:5:0:0>let's see if you
can <clr:0000>defeat three combatants in under
1 minute<clr:ffff>.
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Then let's start the training!<sp:5:1:0> All hands,
prepare for combat!
Talk_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>The more you train, the more you nourish
your mind and body. <sp:5:1:0>It's always a good
idea to sharpen your skills.
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You've prepared <clr:0000>100 rupees<clr:ffff> for the
training fee, yes? Be warned, there will be
no quitting until the challenge is done.
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>The training fee is typically <clr:0000>100 rupees<clr:ffff>...
but since you're new to this, I suppose
your first round can be free.
Know that should you take this challenge,
there's no turning back. You must fight
until the time limit—or your life—expires.
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Even without a prize on the line, your
devotion to Master Kohga has you eager
to train.
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><snd:Happy_00>I like it!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


To reward your admirable ambition, I will
waive your training fee!<sp:0:4:0>But know this—should you enter the
arena, there will be no quitting till all
is said and done.
Talk_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>To reward your admirable ambition, I will
allow you to train for free!<sp:0:4:0>But know this—should you enter the
arena, there will be no quitting till all
is said and done.
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Angry>You'll never beat that accursed
swordsman without training!
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We train by sparring with our fellow Yiga.<sp:5:0:0>
We set a timer, and the combatants just
keep coming.
You'll earn better and better <clr:0000>prizes<clr:ffff> based
on the number of opponents you defeat.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Let's see...<sp:5:0:0> If we really want to measure
your strength...

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Show me you can defeat three
combatants in under <clr:0000>1 minute<clr:ffff>.
Talk_35:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ah.<sp:5:1:0> You again.


I hear that you became a blademaster.
Faster than any other Yiga in history too.

<snd:QuestionNormal>But in my arena, you're still a newcomer.
And don't you forget it.
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>On the line is our <clr:0000>Earthwake technique<clr:ffff>,<sp:5:0:0>
capable use of which marks you as a
true member of the Yiga Clan.
Of course, to prove yourself worthy of
such a prize, you would have to defeat
six combatants... Think you're up for it?
Talk_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You spar continuously with Yiga members
for <clr:0000>1 minute<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:1:0> That's it.

Nobody's going to be pulling punches
here either. <sp:5:1:0>Once training begins, you'll
all fight like your lives depend on it.
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You spar continuously with Yiga members
for <clr:0000>1 minute<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:1:0> That's it.<sp:5:1:0> The <clr:0000>prizes<clr:ffff> will
change depending on how many you beat.
Nobody's going to be pulling punches
here either. <sp:5:1:0>Once training begins, you'll
all fight like your lives depend on it.
Talk_37:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>...<sp:5:0:0>Hmm.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><snd:TalkPositive>I'm impressed you're still standing.<sp:5:1:0>
You defeated three of our fighters,
just as I hoped you would.
Talk_39:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_01>Many capable fighters have trained in this
arena,<sp:5:0:0> but you're the first to defeat nine
of your peers.
Talk_40:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Never thought I'd see the day one of my
pupils would don that helm.<sp:5:1:0> Now...<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal_00>You haven't even broken in your outfit,
and you're asking about the prizes?

Good. <sp:5:0:0>Nothing wrong with a little greed.


<sp:3:0:2:0700>Defeat three combatants, and I will give
you some <clr:0000>Yiga Clan fabric<clr:ffff> as proof that
you trained with us.
Defeat six, and I will instruct you in our
secret skill—the <clr:0000>Earthwake technique<clr:ffff>!

If you somehow manage to defeat nine,
then the Yiga Clan's sacred treasure, the
<clr:0000>Lightning Helm<clr:ffff>, will be yours.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_00>Not that anyone's ever been able to do
THAT, of course.
Talk_41:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Angry>Attack the newcomer as if he were
Link himself! For Master Kohga!
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Angry>Where are you going, you fool?! <sp:5:1:0>You're
still in the middle of training!
Talk_13: <sp:3:0:2:0701>...<sp:5:1:0>Not bad for a newcomer, I suppose.
Talk_42:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Hold on...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Your pouch is full. Make some room, and
come claim your prize!
